summary: Container class that encapsulates the outputs of a LUKE masked language modeling run, including overall loss, separate MLM and entity prediction losses, prediction logits for tokens and entities, and optional hiddenâ€‘state and attention tensors.
business_intent: Facilitate training and evaluation of the LUKE model by delivering all relevant scalar and tensor results in a single structured object, allowing downstream code to compute gradients, extract predictions, and analyze model internals.
